characters.descr: A creation of Gran Kain, Humans have well-balanced stats and adapt quickly to any class. Humans worship Einhasad, the goddess of light.

classes.descr: Tank with high Def. and an array of defensive skills
classes.infos: Paladin is a good balance tanker class with the most defensive skill as well as actives skill that is good in mass pvp. Mass silence is a good crowd control skill in pvp.

classes.descr: Damage dealer who attacks enemies while continuously weakening them
classes.infos: Warlord is a DPS class that have high def due to heavy armory. His skills that deal stuns and knockdown make him quite optimize in pvp and pve. He also have a good offensive pt buff that is region wide.
